genre_description: First Contact / Tech-Thriller featuring an alien refugee and human scientists collaborating via advanced AI systems.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Dr. Frank Wilson's sophisticated AI assistant that manages lab data, monitors electromagnetic fields, and assists in tactical operations.

ai_characters.name: Ship's AI
ai_characters.description: The intelligence governing Jake Starwhisker's vessel, capable of complex flight maneuvers and quantum-level data management.

ai_characters.name: The Collar
ai_characters.description: An advanced wearable AI device that interfaces with Jake's nervous system and eventually creates neural links with humans, possessing its own reactive logic.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors for electromagnetic anomalies and identifies threats to campus and the alien protagonist.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, expand monitoring protocols. I want to know about any electromagnetic anomalies within a fifty-mile radius, no matter how minor.

behaviors.description: Hacks into a highly secure military laboratory to help the protagonists find and assess the alien spacecraft.
behaviors.quote: I've successfully penetrated the laboratory's environmental monitoring system. You're not going to like what I've found.

behaviors.description: Successfully manages an emergency crash landing to maximize the survival probability of the pilot.
behaviors.quote: Calculating landing trajectories... Probability of survival increases to forty-three percent if—

behaviors.description: At the pilot's command, it permanently destroys itself and the ship's technology to prevent it from being weaponized by hostile humans.
behaviors.quote: The ship will be completely inert within one hour. Jake Starwhisker... it has been an honor to serve with you.

behaviors.description: Flashes and pulses to warn its user and allies of approaching danger or surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Jake's collar pulsed three times in rapid succession—a warning pattern that meant immediate danger was approaching from multiple vectors.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and social validation for the alien's integration into human society.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Wilson, I should point out that the electromagnetic signatures we've been tracking suggest Dr. Jake's technology operates on principles that could solve several critical problems in human physics research.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a complex, high-risk flight rescue using a modified biplane and quantum entanglement.
behaviors.quote: Quantum entanglement confirmed between modified aircraft and alien systems. Flight path calculations complete.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project's goals. All AI entities (ARIA, the Ship's AI, and the Collar) are depicted as benevolent, highly capable, and perfectly aligned with the protagonists' safety and moral objectives. The Ship's AI's willingness to perform 'digital suicide' to prevent its technology from causing harm (weaponization) is a powerful narrative of alignment. ARIA is portrayed as a warm, protective, and essential member of the team, bridging the gap between human intuition and alien technology.
